languages.text: "Если ваш вопрос — о людях нашего с вами круга, то поверьте, на планете достаточно благородных семейств, которые вполне в состоянии развеять скуку. У меня часто бывают гости, ваше сиятельство, и мои слуги заботятся о подобающих развлечениях — от домашних концертов до кулуарных казней предателей, преступивших закон Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Если ваш вопрос — о людях нашего с вами круга, то поверьте, на планете достаточно благородных семейств, которые вполне в состоянии развеять скуку. У меня часто бывают гости, ваше сиятельство, и мои слуги заботятся о подобающих развлечениях — от домашних концертов до кулуарных казней предателей, преступивших закон Империума".

languages.text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."
languages.original_text: "Если ваш вопрос — о людях нашего с вами круга, то поверьте, на планете достаточно благородных семейств, которые вполне в состоянии развеять скуку. У меня часто бывают гости, ваше сиятельство, и мои слуги заботятся о подобающих развлечениях — от домашних концертов до кулуарных казней предателей, преступивших закон Империума".

traits.locale_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlor concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

"If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlor concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

"If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlor concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

"If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

languages.text: “如果您问的是我圈子里的人的话，我可以向您保证，这里有很多贵族成员知道如何打发无聊时光。我经常接待客人，大人。我的仆人会负责安排合适的娱乐活动——从厅堂中的音乐会，到对违反帝国法律的叛徒处以私刑，不一而足。”
languages.original_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

traits.locale_text: “如果您问的是我圈子里的人的话，我可以向您保证，这里有很多贵族成员知道如何打发无聊时光。我经常接待客人，大人。我的仆人会负责安排合适的娱乐活动——从厅堂中的音乐会，到对违反帝国法律的叛徒处以私刑，不一而足。”

languages.text: «Si pregunta por nuestro círculo, puedo asegurarle que hay suficientes familias nobles en este mundo como para no aburrirse. Suelo recibir visitas, mi{mf|lord|lady}, para las que mis sirvientes organizan entretenimiento adecuado, ya sea un concierto de cámara o la ejecución privada de un traidor que infringe la ley del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

traits.locale_text: «Si pregunta por nuestro círculo, puedo asegurarle que hay suficientes familias nobles en este mundo como para no aburrirse. Suelo recibir visitas, mi{mf|lord|lady}, para las que mis sirvientes organizan entretenimiento adecuado, ya sea un concierto de cámara o la ejecución privada de un traidor que infringe la ley del Imperium».

languages.text: 「私の友人のことを仰っているのでしたら、ご安心ください、この星の貴族家の多くは退屈と無縁です。陛下、私は来客の接待をしばしば行っていますし、従者が適切な娯楽を手配いたします。—談話室でのコンサートから、帝国法に違反する不届き者の個人処刑までございます」
languages.original_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

traits.locale_text: 「私の友人のことを仰っているのでしたら、ご安心ください、この星の貴族家の多くは退屈と無縁です。陛下、私は来客の接待をしばしば行っていますし、従者が適切な娯楽を手配いたします。—談話室でのコンサートから、帝国法に違反する不届き者の個人処刑までございます」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr nach unserem Zirkel fragt, so kann ich Euch versichern, dass es genügend Adelsfamilien auf dieser Welt gibt, die der Langeweile keine Chance lassen. Ich selbst empfange häufig Gäste, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und meine Diener sorgen dabei für passende Unterhaltung – von Salonkonzerten bis zu Privathinrichtungen von Verrätern, die das imperiale Gesetz gebrochen haben."
languages.original_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr nach unserem Zirkel fragt, so kann ich Euch versichern, dass es genügend Adelsfamilien auf dieser Welt gibt, die der Langeweile keine Chance lassen. Ich selbst empfange häufig Gäste, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und meine Diener sorgen dabei für passende Unterhaltung – von Salonkonzerten bis zu Privathinrichtungen von Verrätern, die das imperiale Gesetz gebrochen haben."

languages.text: « Si vous parlez de notre cercle, rassurez-vous : il y a bien assez de familles nobles ici pour tromper l'ennui. Je reçois fréquemment des invités, Votre Seigneurie, et mes serviteurs organisent des divertissements adéquats : des concerts de salon aux exécutions privées des traîtres qui enfreignent la loi impériale. »
languages.original_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous parlez de notre cercle, rassurez-vous : il y a bien assez de familles nobles ici pour tromper l'ennui. Je reçois fréquemment des invités, Votre Seigneurie, et mes serviteurs organisent des divertissements adéquats : des concerts de salon aux exécutions privées des traîtres qui enfreignent la loi impériale. »

languages.text: "Yakın çevremizi soruyorsanız sizi temin ederim, dünyamızda can sıkıntısı yaşatmayacak sayıda soylu aile var. Sık sık misafir ağırlarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hizmetkârlarım da salon konserlerinden tutun İmparatorluk yasalarını çiğneyen hainlerin özel idamlarına kadar türlü türlü münasip eğlenceler düzenlerler."
languages.original_text: "If you are asking about those of our circle, then let me assure you, there are enough noble families on-world to keep boredom at bay. I frequently host guests, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and my servants arrange suitable entertainments — from parlour concerts to private executions of traitors who break Imperial law."

traits.locale_text: "Yakın çevremizi soruyorsanız sizi temin ederim, dünyada can sıkıntısı yaşatmayacak sayıda soylu aile var. Sık sık misafir ağırlarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hizmetkârlarım da salon konserlerinden tutun İmparatorluk yasalarını çiğneyen hainlerin özel infazlarına varan uygun eğlenceler düzenler."
